title: BufWriter::write panics during flush_buf

labels.name: T-libs-api
labels.description: Relevant to the library API team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I'm still investigating this but it seems if we have a `BufStream `around a ~~UnixStream~~ `openssl::ssl::SslStream<std::net::TcpStream>`, and we write to it too quickly it panics.

The `std::net::TcpStream` is non-blocking which might be relevant.
